Advanced protection before youâ€™ve even lifted a finger
mIDShield is your constant security partner, checking the device on which the dedicated app is running before the app is launched. Once those checks are confirmed, we bind the app to the device and perform ongoing checks to permanently ensure integrity, authenticity and confidentiality in real-time.
